job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-09T20:22:44.000Z", "description": "

 Sr. Consultant - Artificial Intelligence


Incedo is a US-based consulting, data science and technology services firm with over 2,000 people helping clients from our six offices across US and India. We help our clients achieve competitive advantage through end-to-end digital transformation. Our uniqueness lies in bringing together strong engineering, data science, and design capabilities coupled with deep domain understanding. We combine services and products to maximize business impact for our clients in telecom, financial services, product engineering and life science & healthcare industries.


Working at Incedo will provide you an opportunity to work with industry leading client organizations, deep technology and domain experts, and global teams. Incedo University, our learning platform, provides ample learning opportunities starting with a structured onboarding program and carrying throughout various stages of your career. A variety of fun activities are also an integral part of our friendly work environment. Our flexible career paths allow you to grow into a program manager, a technical architect or a domain expert based on your skills and interests.


Role Description:


As a Sr. Consultant-AI on the Data Science team, you will play a critical role in ideating, developing and then implementing advanced analytics solution in production. You will be helping business leaders identify and prioritize their business problems, based on value creation and Business ROI. These may be opportunities within a single line of business or cross-organizational initiatives. This role helps in bridging the technical expertise of Data Scientists with the operation expertise of frontline managers thereby ensuring that the deep insights generated through sophisticated analytics translate into impact at scale in an organization.


Potential hires are expected to own the end-to-end process from development into implementation which involves data extraction, feature engineering, model building and model testing along with documentation.

 

Role and responsibilities


Problem solving and client consulting:

  • Strong problem solving and analytical skills with excellent understanding of critical business problems in domains \u2013 preferably Telecom.
  • Breaking up big business problems into actionable Analytics/ Data Science problems
  • Give thought leadership on problem definition and defining the key metrics to target.
  • Ability to translate a business problem into digital and analytics problem.
  • \u201cOwn the problem\u201d and integrate design, analytics, and engineering capabilities to deliver impactful solution to client problems.

 

Data Analytics and Insights

\u00b7      Understand client and business domain and integrate client business issues with data insights.

\u00b7      Ability to analyze business metrics, perform data analysis to generate and deliver impactful insights and recommendation.

\u00b7      Identify the important variables that will be required for the model.

\u00b7      Design the validation metric to evaluate machine learning models.

\u00b7      Ability to work in multiple projects/ problems in parallel.

 

Technical skills requirements

The candidate must demonstrate proficiency in,

\u00b7      Conceptual understanding on machine learning techniques

\u00b7      Extremely detail-oriented with high standards for written and visual presentation of information as well as idea.

\u00b7      Ability to develop and articulate strategic recommendations based on rigorous data analysis.

\u00b7      Strong expertise in SQL

\u00b7      Prior experience in ML models deployed in production.

\u00b7      Strong understanding of A/B, Multivariate testing.

\u00b7      EDA/preliminary model building using Python.

\u00b7      Data Visualization skills in Tableau/Power BI/Looker or similar tools.

\u00b7      Experience with model explainability techniques and building an explainable ML solution.

\u00b7      Experience presenting to and influencing functional leaders and stakeholders.

 

Nice-to-have skills:

\u00b7      Prior experience with Telecom industry and a deep understanding of common problem statements and solutions in Telecom

\u00b7      Exposure to working in a cloud environment (preferably GCP)

 

Qualifications:

  • B.E/B.Tech., with an MBA degree from a reputed university

\u00b7      5+ years of experience in Business/AI/Analytics Consulting in a Client Management/ Consulting role

 

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer

We value diversity at Incedo. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
